comments.body:
I didn't add the `<!--BEGIN/END MUNGE RELEASE_LINK-->` tags because some of our scripts check `<!--END MUNGE` without further checking the tag contents, so those scripts get confused if I add the tag.

I think the tag at this line is clear enough and does't lose any functionality.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@const unversionedWarningLink = `

<!-- TAG RELEASE_LINK, added by the munger automatically -->
<strong>
The latest release of this document can be found
